release_notes:
✅ Fixed bugs
✅ Improved performance
✅ New features added

instructions.khmer:
ការប្រើប្រាស់:
1. Upload file .exe របស់អ្នកទៅ GitHub Releases
2. Copy download URL
3. ផ្លាស់ប្តូរ download_url ខាងលើ
4. Upload file version.json នេះទៅ GitHub raw URL
5. Copy URL របស់ version.json ដាក់ក្នុង update_config.json
6. ពេលចុច Update កម្មវិធីនឹង download version ថ្មីស្វ័យប្រវត្តិ
instructions.github_releases:
1. ទៅ GitHub repo > Releases > Create new release
2. Tag: v1.0.9
3. Upload .exe file
4. Publish release
5. Right-click file > Copy link address
instructions.google_drive:
1. Upload .exe to Google Drive
2. Right-click > Share > Anyone with link
3. Copy link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/FILE_ID/view
4. Convert to direct: https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=FILE_ID
